title: The Marker Resort Selected to Conde Nast Traveler Readers Choice
short_description: More than 128,000 Conde Nast Traveler Readers have spoken—and they’re all humming the same tune...
more_content:
More than 128,000 Conde Nast Traveler Readers have spoken—and they’re all humming the same tune: The Marker Waterfront Resort is a standout amongst Florida hotels, sitting at #12 among the 24 top resorts in Florida that were awarded. The annual survey, now in its 28th year, received an all-time high percentage of responses complete with first-hand insights and comments. According to Conde Nast Traveler’s site, this year readers, “declared a passion for the authentic, the personalized, and the unexpected.” From our candidly authentic Keys experience, to being one of the best known wedding venues in Key West, it’s clear that readers are loving The Marker Resort.

 

When asked about the honor, our Complex Director of Sales & Marketing, Michael Dwyer stated, “Our fantastic location, right in the heart of Key West’s historic Old Town, has inspired our approach to providing guests with luxurious accommodations that reflect the culture, heritage and spirit of the tropical oasis we are proud to call our home.”

What truly exemplifies The Marker experience, is also what sets it apart from other Key West resorts. After opening less than a year ago, it stands as one of the newest builds in the Southernmost city since 1994. Our guest experience embodies the attitude of the Keys—luxury, with a laidback feel. We treat guests to top-of-the-line amenities and authentic local activities. There are so many local offerings, quaint shops, and specialized tours, and we encourage and connect our guests to partake in the vibrant community. We want couples to enjoy the tranquility of our grounds away from their busy work life by sipping champagne and enjoying a warm weathered Key West night. "We want families to enjoy days at The Key West Aquarium and Historic Seaport, and comeback to one of our pools to unwind (making sure that the parents have margaritas in hand!) At The Marker Resort, it’s not just about the amenities, but the dedication to contribute to the Key West community as a whole. At the heart of The Marker Resort’s aesthetic is the influence of local artists and artisans, as well as the vibrant colors that pulse through the town. Whether padding across our two acres of tropical backdrop or relaxing by one of the three private swimming pools, it’s easy to understand why The Marker Resort is a top spot amongst guests, readers, and friends.
